meanings.definition: The quality of being excessively particular or fussy about minor details.
meanings.sent1: Her finickiness with the color scheme delayed the project.
meanings.sent2: His finickiness about his appearance made getting ready a long process.
meanings.sent3: The finickiness of the cat when it comes to food is quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The finickiness of the artist in choosing the perfect brush stroke was like a delicate dance.
meanings.sent5: The finickiness of the chef in selecting ingredients created a masterpiece dish.

meanings.definition: The state of being overly concerned with trivial matters.
meanings.sent1: The finickiness of his roommate about cleanliness was starting to annoy him.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand the finickiness of her colleague when it came to office supplies.
meanings.sent3: The finickiness of the weatherman about predicting rain on sunny days was quite funny.
meanings.sent4: The finickiness of the politician in choosing his words carefully was like walking on eggshells.
meanings.sent5: The finickiness of the child in arranging toys by color was a sight to behold.
